# 2SkyMobile - Complete AI Context Document

> 2SkyMobile is a full-stack telecom partner providing eSIM platforms, wholesale mobile data, billing systems, and custom software for MVNOs, resellers, and enterprises. Coverage in 190+ countries with 600+ carrier networks.

## Company Overview

2SkyMobile enables telecom businesses worldwide with infrastructure for mobile connectivity, eSIM provisioning, automated billing, and API integrations. 

**Mission**: To democratize global connectivity by providing businesses of all sizes with enterprise-grade telecom infrastructure, enabling them to launch and scale mobile services without the complexity of traditional carrier relationships.

**Vision**: To become the global standard for telecom-as-a-service, where any business can seamlessly integrate mobile connectivity into their products.

**Headquarters**: Delaware, United States
**Regional Offices**: Lagos (Nigeria), Jakarta (Indonesia)

## Complete Solution Portfolio

### 1. Wholesale Mobile Data
Multi-IMSI, multi-network mobile data coverage in 190+ countries. Features include:
- Dynamic SIM profile management
- Real-time IMSI switching across 600+ carrier networks
- Competitive wholesale rates
- Enterprise-grade reliability with 99.99% uptime

### 2. White-Label eSIM Platform
Launch your branded eSIM business in weeks:
- Custom branding and white-label store
- Automated eSIM provisioning
- Web and mobile applications
- API for full automation
- Marketing tools included

### 3. Billing Platform
Operator-grade billing and revenue management:
- Real-time rating engine
- Flexible pricing models
- Automated invoicing
- Multi-currency settlement
- Financial analytics and reporting

### 4. IoT Connectivity
Global IoT and M2M connectivity solutions:
- Multi-network SIMs
- Remote SIM management
- Scalable infrastructure
- Low-power network support

### 5. Custom Software Development
Bespoke telecom software:
- CRM systems
- Customer portals
- Network management tools
- Operational dashboards

### 6. API Integrations
Developer-first approach:
- RESTful APIs for all services
- Comprehensive documentation
- SDKs for major platforms
- Webhooks and automation tools
- Sandbox environment for testing

## Technical Infrastructure

### Platform Architecture
- **Application Layer**: Customer Portal, Partner Dashboard, API Gateway, Admin Console
- **Service Layer**: Provisioning Engine, Rating & Billing, Analytics Engine, Notification Service
- **Core Network**: Multi-IMSI HLR/HSS, SMSC/MMSC, Diameter/SS7 Gateway, Packet Gateway
- **Infrastructure**: Global PoPs, Redundant Data Centers, IPX Interconnects, Carrier Peering

### Key Metrics
- 600+ carrier networks
- <50ms average latency
- 99.99% uptime SLA
- 190+ countries covered

### Security & Compliance
- SOC 2 Type II certified
- GSMA SAS-SM certified eSIM platform
- ISO 27001 compliant operations
- PCI DSS Level 1 for payments
- GDPR and CCPA compliant
- Private APN with IPsec/IKEv2
- End-to-end TLS 1.3 encryption

## Partner Program

### MVNO Partners
For companies launching digital connectivity products:
- Multi-IMSI access
- Turnkey technical node
- Billing & settlements
- Dedicated account manager

### Resellers & eSIM Stores
For travel companies, OTAs, fintech, digital brands:
- Best wholesale pricing
- White-label store (web + mobile)
- API for automation
- Marketing tools

### Technology Integrators
For developers and agencies:
- API-first access
- Webhooks & automation
- Sandbox environment
- Integration commissions

## Latest News

For dynamically generated news with AI summaries, see:
https://2skymobile.com/api/llms-txt

This endpoint returns the latest published news articles with their summary_for_llm field, providing AI-optimized summaries of each article.
